title: #342:  Ancient Myths, Celestial Stories, The Anunnaki and the Power of Namaste with David Mathisen
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Ancient Celestial Myth researcher David Mathisen to the discuss how we are all discussing the same ancient myths but using different words to tell it! When you really break it down it's just Namaste, folks! I see me in you and you see you in me. Thank you so much for your support.

Touring Dates:
San Diego, my gig at the American Comedy Company this weekend is still going on. I will be live downtown in San Diego this Thursday thru Saturday. Grab your tickets now at https://americancomedyco.com

Please check out David Mathisen's internet:
Website: https://www.starmythworld.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/davidwmathisen
